channel.title: How do i find the cowards of were im standing
channel.description: title seys it all... just wanna know how i find the X and Y of the place im standing at. the client does not ahve any thing to tell me that.

item.title: How do i find the cowards of were im standing
item.dc:creator: @Evanz Evanz
item.description:
@Evanz wrote:

[quote=“adog17x, post:2, topic:191768”]If you have dodian type ::mypos

if you have mopar type ::coordson[/quote]

What he said,
or,
logg out - - - open your char file - - - look at co-ords…
But that one takes ages :S

item.title: How do i find the cowards of were im standing
item.dc:creator: @adog17x adog17x
item.description:
@adog17x wrote:

If you have dodian type ::mypos

if you have mopar type ::coordson

maybe this command might work im not sure

if (command.startsWith("mypos")) { sendMessage("You are standing on X=" + absX + " Y=" + absY + " Your Height=" + heightLevel); sendMessage("MapRegionX=" + mapRegionX + " MapRegionY=" + mapRegionY); sendMessage("CurrentX=" + currentX + " CurrentY=" + currentY); } } }
